translations: 不存在；虚无；无足轻重的人

sentences.sentence: She was written off then as a political nonentity.
sentences.translation: 作为政坛上的小人物，那时没人拿她当回事。

sentences.sentence: Aged 76, he succumbed to a rare moment of self-pity: "So I am to become a nonentity, am I?"
sentences.translation: 当他七十六岁时，他忍不住地自怜起来，“难道我现在就成了这样一个无名之人吗？”

sentences.sentence: Aged 76, he succumbed to a rare moment of self-pity: "So I am to become a nonentity, am I?" Hardly.
sentences.translation: 当他七十六岁时，他忍不住地自怜起来，“难道我现在就成了这样一个无名之人吗？不会的。”
